original_text: Andrew was one of the two disciples who had followed Jesus. They had heard what John had said about Jesus. Andrew was Simon Peter's brother.
korean_text: 요한의 말을 듣고 예수를 따르는 두 사람 중의 하나는 시몬 베드로의 형제 안드레라

sentences.original_text: Andrew was one of the two disciples
sentences.korean_translation: 안드레는 두 제자 중 한 명이었습니다

sentences.original_text: what John had said about Jesus
